alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Medina; Richland; Stark; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Richland, southern Medina, eastern Ashland, southwestern Stark, southwestern Summit, Wayne and northern Holmes Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from West Salem to 7 miles east of Hayesville to 7 miles southeast of Bellville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Akron, Wooster, Massillon, Barberton, Green, Wadsworth, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Lodi, Loudonville, Creston, Brewster, Navarre, Dalton, Shreve, West Salem, Holmesville, Wilmot and Mount Eaton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
